arguments.input_description: The image shows three empty boxes of different sizes drawn in a scattered arrangement on the page, with handwritten text at the top saying "Draw an X in each box."
arguments.output_description: Drawing X marks inside each of the three boxes
arguments.svg:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="1404" height="1872">
  <!-- X for top left box -->
  <path d="M300 200 L400 300 M400 200 L300 300" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
  
  <!-- X for right box -->
  <path d="M800 200 L900 300 M900 200 L800 300" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
  
  <!-- X for bottom box -->
  <path d="M300 800 L375 875 M375 800 L300 875" stroke="black" stroke-width="2" fill="none"/>
</svg>
